name: Origin Deals
description: Origin Deals gives you access to amazing deals on millions of items from Amazon when you stake OGN. Click “Buy on Origin Deals” to save up to 20%. All products purchased on Origin Deals are shipped directly from Amazon.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; connect-src http://localhost:*/ https://graphql.originprotocol.com https://growth.originprotocol.com https://browser-extension-api-dot-origin-214503.appspot.com https://origindeals.com ws://localhost:*/;
